content.question: If <math alttext="h of x, equals, the integral from, negative 1 to x cubed, of, the square root of 2 plus, t squared, end root, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mi>h</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> for <math alttext="x greater than or equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="h prime of x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of 2 plus, x squared, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of 2 plus, x to the sixth power, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times x squared, times, the square root of 2 plus, x squared, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times x squared, times, the square root of 2 plus, x to the sixth power, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3 times x squared, times, the square root of 2 plus, x to the sixth power, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.4: The Fundamental Theorem of Calculus and Accumulation Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
